ComicInfo.Title: Home Sweet Hell
ComicInfo.Summary: The adventures of Ashley J. Williams continue in the Army of Darkness from writers James Kuhoric and Mike Raicht, along with artist Fernando Blanco! "Home Sweet Hell" continues as our hero finds himself still acting decidedly "unheroic" as the effects of too much dimension and time hopping may have finally taken their toll! But, as demons conspire around him, and the fate of his friends lies in the balance, will ash be able to stand up and reclaim his Chosen One mantle? Featuring a cover by fan-favorite artist Fabiano Neves and a special variant cover by Stjepan Sejic!
